RightPrice is your indispensable tool for a more efficient and informed property search on Rightmove.co.uk. By enhancing each property ad with detailed information, RightPrice allows you to instantly access historic price changes, showing you how a property's price has evolved over time, which helps you negotiate better deals. It also provides full address details or complete postcodes, giving you the exact location of each property and helping you assess proximity to key amenities.

With RightPrice, you can easily see how long a property has been on the market, access recent sales records from both the UK Land Registry and Rightmove, and view current rental listings—all directly within the ad. This means you have all the crucial information you need right at your fingertips, saving time and enabling you to make smarter decisions when evaluating properties.

Gain a competitive edge with precise insights tailored to each property. Understand the surrounding area better and quickly assess tenant affordability through Local Housing Allowance rates, all based on the property's address.

Whether you're a first-time buyer or a seasoned investor, RightPrice enhances each property search by adding valuable, precise information to every ad, giving you the edge you need to succeed. Try it today and experience a new level of property hunting efficiency.

How We Collect and Update Data:

RightPrice uses an advanced system to automatically collect and update property data every few minutes, ensuring that you have access to the most current information available. While our system is robust, having more users helps to catch any updates that might occasionally be missed. By using RightPrice and sharing it with your friends, you can help improve the accuracy and freshness of the data for everyone!

Key Features:

> Historic Price Changes: Access a comprehensive history of price changes for each property, including the original listing price and every subsequent reduction. Knowing the price history helps you gauge the seller’s motivation and negotiate better deals, as you can see how long a property has been on the market and how its price has fluctuated over time.

> Full Address or Postcode Details: For some ads, RightPrice can provide the full address, including the street number and full postcode. For other listings, you'll get the complete postcode, helping you to locate properties more precisely and understand their proximity to key amenities.

> Days on the Market: Track the number of days a property has been listed, including the original listing date and any price reductions, allowing you to negotiate better deals.

> Recent Sales Data (UK Land Registry): Access recent sales records from the UK Land Registry for the same postcode and property type, offering valuable insights into market trends.

> Recent Sales Data (Rightmove): Obtain recent sales records from Rightmove to complement the UK Land Registry data and gain a comprehensive understanding of the property's market history.

> Current Rental Ads: Instantly access the latest rental listings for the same postcode and property type, facilitating rental income estimates and a better understanding of the local rental market.

> Local Housing Allowance Rates: Find a direct link to Local Housing Allowance (LHA) rates specific to the postcode, helping you understand government housing support, tenant affordability, and potential rental income.

> Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) Ratings: Easily access the Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) ratings for properties to assess their energy efficiency and potential costs for heating and electricity.

Get Started Today!
Download RightPrice now and transform the way you search for properties. Test out all the features, leave a comment with your feedback, and let us know if there are any additional features you’d like to see. Your insights help us improve and provide the best property search experience possible!
